caption.title: Four life stages of Agasicles hygrophila and damage to on Alternanthera philoxeroides by Agasicles hygrophila.
caption.p: (a) egg stage, 4.1±0.77 days, (b) larva stage, 7.8±0.78 days, (c) pupa stage,8.6±0.57 days, and (d) adult stage, 50.3± 2.42 days [ 38]. (e) leaf feeding by larvae and adults, (f) stem boring after pupation. Average means ±1 standard error.
